name: our-favorite-country-musician-remixes-our-other-favorite-country-musician-snoop-dogg
title: Our Favorite Country Musician Remixes Our Other Favorite Country Musician [Snoop Dogg]
author: Morgan Levy
excerpt: Remember back in July when we told you that Snoop Dogg was going to be remixing Johnny Cash’s “Walk The Line” for a Johnny Cash Remixed project? Well, the day has arrived. Sort of. The album comes out January 27, but thanks to a stroke of good luck, we can actually listen to good ol’ Snoop’s track in its entirety RIGHT NOW. Thanks to the Nashville Cream for digging it up, it totally made our day.
